name: supporting
text: Please answer the following questions in relation to the data set you are submitting to the IMBIE GIA experiment group.

elements.name: methods-and-errors
elements.label: 9. Please provide the doi of a peer-reviewed article describing your methods and errors in full. In case your methods have not been published yet, please upload a document describing those for the IMBIE Executive Committee to review. (If you wish to upload multiple files, please upload them as a single .zip file)
